explanations.General Practice: General practitioners can diagnose and treat a wide range of common conditions
explanations.Cardiology: Cardiologists specialize in heart and cardiovascular system conditions
explanations.Dermatology: Dermatologists are experts in skin, hair, and nail conditions
explanations.Orthopedics: Orthopedic specialists focus on bones, joints, and musculoskeletal issues
explanations.Pediatrics: Pediatricians provide specialized care for infants, children, and adolescents
explanations.Psychiatry: Psychiatrists specialize in mental health diagnosis and treatment
